channel.title: Startup on Bongio's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Startup on Bongio's blog

item.title: Looking for Ikigai
item.description: In the last couple of months, I’ve been reading and learning about topics I did not care about in the past. If I had heard of them, I would have wondered why people would care about them and believe in them.

item.title: Pushers and pullers - Or how I entrepreneur the wrong way
item.description: I’m an unrelenting pusher. No, not I don’t push drugs. I push my products and ideas to people instead of looking for their pain points and creating solutions to real problems.
